data.title: Thunderbird Films - Production List
data.meta_description: Thunderbird Films was founded in 2019 by two industry veterans, Randy Wayne and Talia Bella, who decided to partner their strengths and relocate from Los Angeles to Oklahoma and provide the state with much needed production services and support.
data.meta_site_name: Production List | Film & Television Industry Alliance
data.text:
Â© 2024 Film & Television Industry Alliance

FTIA is dedicated to providing film and television industry professionals with up-to-date job announcements and casting call opportunities in the entertainment industry. Our weekly publication provides a comprehensive breakdown of feature films, television shows, pilots, and digital media projects currently in pre-production and active development.
